title: Establish modular project layout (src/ split by pipeline stage)
body:
## Summary

Split `src/` into modules per pipeline stage following Parnas information-hiding principles.

## Proposed layout

```
src/
  main.zig            -- entry point / CLI
  frontend/
    lexer.zig
    parser.zig
    layout.zig         -- layout rule
  typechecker/
    ...
  core/
    ir.zig             -- Core IR types
  grin/
    ir.zig             -- GRIN IR types
  backend/
    llvm.zig
  runtime/
    ...
  diagnostics/
    diagnostic.zig     -- structured error types
    span.zig           -- source spans
```

## Requirements

- Each module has a clear public interface
- `build.zig` updated to handle the new structure
- Basic smoke test that the project still compiles
